title: dodge button please
body: This always happens whenever i play ranked and want to dodge, I end up with an unranked cunt on my team with 2 other premades who go like 0-10 as expected and bring no masteries into the game and me being the only one with good scores i just wanted to dodge that one game - but i didnt know until that unranked says at last second " this is going to be interesting my first ranked game!" i knew i was fucked.. i clicked the x to exit thinking i did so but somehow im in game.... Pls ffs add a dodge button would really help

replies.body:
"#bronze"
But I kinda see your point, maybe if they did it like they do with rerolls for aram. Where you have to play like 20 games to get a doge point or something. for those situations where you just know its not gonna work.

Yes your the only good one.

1.5 KDA average on Riven, which is your main champion, not to mention 30% win rate.
